snippet: The defendants, members of the Church of Almighty God, were sentenced Saturday for the beating death of a woman who rebuffed their attempts to recruit her, state-run news media reported.
abstract: China sentences Zhang Fan and her father Zhang Lidong, both members of the Church of Almighty God, to death for fatal beating of Wu Shuoyan, who refused to join their sect.
lead_paragraph: The defendants, members of the Church of Almighty God, were sentenced Saturday for the beating death of a woman who rebuffed their attempts to recruit her, state-run news media reported.

headline.main: China Issues Death Penalty in Sect Killing
headline.print_headline: China Issues Death Penalty in Sect Killing
